trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error condition occurs during the opening, accessing, or using of a [PrintDialog](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/printdialog.md).
trans-unit.target: 在開啟、存取或使用 [PrintDialog](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/printdialog.md) 期間，當錯誤條件發生時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> class that provides a specific error condition in a <see cref="T:System.String" /> .
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 類別的新執行個體，該類別會在 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 中提供特定的錯誤條件。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需要的資料。

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 已序列化資料流的內容，包括來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> class that provides specific <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。
這個建構函式受到保護。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error condition that caused the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" />.
trans-unit.target: 導致 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 的根本錯誤原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> class that provides a specific error condition, including its underlying cause.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialogException" /> 類別的新執行個體，該類別會提供特定的錯誤條件，包括其基礎原因。
